name: Littoral Drift
description:
In 2029 global warming has had as far reaching concequences as predicted. You wake up one morning to a strange orb floating in the bay of your home, jump in and figure out why.

This short story prototype should take 5-10 minutes to complete.

The controls are WASD, click and hold to interact or press and hold e key for certain prompts. Hold the Q key and it'll roughly tell you where to go.

Go from scene to scene, once you've listened to all phone calls/delt with emission events and collected all collectibles you'll be able to progress to the next one.

I plan on updating this project once I've sorted through what suggestions andpolishing to prioritise. Whilst you can finish this game it is far from a finished state so please do bear that in mind whilst playing <3.
